title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 79 - Miscellaneous Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 79 - Miscellaneous Provisions

State Regulations
§ 79.1 - Determination of tax
§ 79.2 - Tax due on June 30, 2010, inventory based on increased cigarette tax
§ 79.3 - Tax due on inventory based on increased cigarette tax
§ 79.4 - Joint administration of articles 20 and 20-A of the Tax Law

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 79

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 472[1], 475, 1142[1], 1250; art. 20; L. 2002, ch. 1; L. 2008, ch. 57, part RR-1; L. 2010, ch. 134, part D
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
